segment.source: End-to-End Planning Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Planning Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: End-to-End Planning Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Planning Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: End-to-End Planning Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Planning Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: This sample scenario for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 helps you achieve your goal of planning your MED-V deployment by using multiple scenarios end-to-end.
segment.target: This sample scenario for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 helps you achieve your goal of planning your MED-V deployment by using multiple scenarios end-to-end.

segment.source: You can think of this sample scenario as a case study that helps put the individual scenarios and procedures in context.
segment.target: You can think of this sample scenario as a case study that helps put the individual scenarios and procedures in context.

segment.source: This section provides basic information and directions for planning you MED-V deployment as an end-to-end solution in your enterprise.
segment.target: This section provides basic information and directions for planning you MED-V deployment as an end-to-end solution in your enterprise.

segment.source: MED-V Planning Step-by-Step Scenario
segment.target: MED-V Planning Step-by-Step Scenario

segment.source: The topics in this step-by-step scenario include the following:
segment.target: The topics in this step-by-step scenario include the following:

segment.source: High-Level Architecture discusses the high-level system architecture and component design of MED-V 2.0.
segment.target: High-Level Architecture discusses the high-level system architecture and component design of MED-V 2.0.

segment.source: MED-V enhances Windows Virtual PC to run two operating systems on one device, adding virtual image delivery, Group Policy-based provisioning, and centralized management.
segment.target: MED-V enhances Windows Virtual PC to run two operating systems on one device, adding virtual image delivery, Group Policy-based provisioning, and centralized management.

segment.source: By using MED-V, you can easily configure, deploy, and manage corporate Windows Virtual PC images on any Windows-based desktop running Windows 7 Professional, Enterprise, or Windows 7 Ultimate.
segment.target: By using MED-V, you can easily configure, deploy, and manage corporate Windows Virtual PC images on any Windows-based desktop running Windows 7 Professional, Enterprise, or Windows 7 Ultimate.

segment.source: Define and Plan your MED-V Deployment discusses the considerations for planning your MED-V 2.0 deployment.
segment.target: Define and Plan your MED-V Deployment discusses the considerations for planning your MED-V 2.0 deployment.

segment.source: This topic provides direction about identifying the systems in your enterprise that receive MED-V and calculating disk space requirements.
segment.target: This topic provides direction about identifying the systems in your enterprise that receive MED-V and calculating disk space requirements.

segment.source: This topic also helps evaluate your existing infrastructure and determines how it can be used for MED-V deployment.
segment.target: This topic also helps evaluate your existing infrastructure and determines how it can be used for MED-V deployment.

segment.source: MED-V 2.0 Best Practices discusses the recommended best practices for planning, installing, deploying, and managing MED-V 2.0 in your environment.
segment.target: MED-V 2.0 Best Practices discusses the recommended best practices for planning, installing, deploying, and managing MED-V 2.0 in your environment.

segment.source: These best practices include recommendations that produce faster run times, better operability during first time setup, increased performance, and better virtual machine management.
segment.target: These best practices include recommendations that produce faster run times, better operability during first time setup, increased performance, and better virtual machine management.
